attr.title: Holy Shit
attr.desc: Navigate through a maze of mischievous park mechanisms where dung balls are your key allies. Carefully plan the order of collection, movement routes, and merging timing to find the optimal solution in chaos.
attr.inst: Download the game free from itch.io (https://be1ugabot.itch.io/holy-shit), extract, and copy HollyShit.pck to the port's folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game free from [itch.io](https://be1ugabot.itch.io/holy-shit), extract, and copy `HollyShit.pck` to the port's folder.
